snippet: “Tripping Out With Alie & Georgia,” is the latest foray into cocktail wizardry on the Cooking Channel, making its premiere Friday night at 10:30.
lead_paragraph: “Tripping Out With Alie & Georgia,” is the latest foray into cocktail wizardry on the Cooking Channel, making its premiere Friday night at 10:30.

headline.main: Drinking Buddies on the Road Again
